document.full_text: infosys technologies ltd, india's no. 2 software services exporter, is on the hunt for acquisitions in europe and japan and in industries including healthcare and public services, its chief executive said on sunday.
document.title: infosys eyes buys in europe, japan, and healthcare sector
lines_and_colors: infosys technologies ltd, india's no. 2 software services exporter, is on the hunt for acquisitions in europe and japan and in industries including healthcare and public services, its chief executive said on sunday.
